Description: Required skills to be successful:-   Commercial acumen, clear strategic thinking, and ability to create buy-in and influence at a senior level-   Strong data analytical, evaluation and interpretation skills, including P&L & good business acumen-   Target oriented and drive to exceed demanding challenges-   Stakeholder management skills with the ability to communicate and interact with officials at all levels About The Team:The role will report to the Head of Planning and Performance and you will be working in a busy Automotive Aftersales Environment. What Equips You For The Role:-  knowledge of automotive after-sales industry will be an advantage.-   At least 3-5 years of experience at an Automotive industry.Job Details
